description: Imports a card summary file produced by ARIBA (https://github.com/sanger-pathogens/ariba).

input.name: file
input.description: The .csv summary file produced by ARIBA.

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable containing the following columns: `sample`, `gene`, `match`, `assembled`, `reference sequence`, `percent identity`, and `contig cov`. Refer to  https://github.com/sanger-pathogens/ariba/wiki/Task%3A-summary#tuning-the-output for detailed desciption of fields.
